author: Geoffrey Morgan
title: Alberta’s small businesses prepare for deep pandemic-induced recession after years of fragility
description: Dual threat of business closures and oil-price war will hit Alberta much harder, with impact going well beyond corporate offices of the oilpatch
content:
CALGARY – George Condon’s small men’s clothing and alterations shop on Stephen Ave., the main strip in Calgary’s downtown core, has weathered both real and economic storms for seven straight years.
There was the flood that submerged downtown Calgary in 2013.… [+8393 chars]
